title: Propose a New Course
description: A department head wants to submit a proposal for a new undergraduate course to be offered next year.

tasks.description: Identify the faculty member and their department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the user's identity and role.

tasks.description: Guide the user to the online curriculum management portal and explain the required proposal form fields.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct link and instructions for the course proposal process.

tasks.description: Check the submitted proposal for completeness before it is routed for committee review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all required fields and attachments (e.g., syllabus) are present.
